data.title: 2024 Manitou LX 25 Rear Facing X-Treme (RFX) Single Engine V-Toon
data.meta_description: Hattiesburg Cycles in Hattiesburg, MS, featuring new and used powersports vehicles for sale, service, and parts near the areas of Laurel, Columbia, Poplarville, and Wiggins
data.text:
With stunning looks and performance, the LX throws average into the shade. Enjoy the thrill of a sharp, banking turn and the adrenaline rush of powerful acceleration.

Features galore, including a sport tower, ski tow bar and upgraded sound system, the LX is ready to hang with the most blinged-out wake sports boat.

V-ToonÂ® technology allows our hulls to plane quickly, corner with the agility of a fiberglass sport boat, and excel when it comes to watersports.

The LX 25 RFX places full bench seating in the bow and stern. Everyone on board will kick back and enjoy the additional space for tanning, cruising and watching the waves. Room for up to 14 persons and a max horsepower of 400 HP (600 HP Dual Engine).

Features may include:

ACCESSORIES

Dual Rear Benches

Rear Fiberglass Pods

Comfort Touch Marine Vinyl

Soft Side Cooler

Built-in Cupholders

Portable Cupholders (2)

Dinette Table

Dual Battery Smart Switch

Extended Starboard Chaise

Chaise Seating with Flip Up Arm Rests

Gas Tank, 43 Gallon Single / 90 Gallon Dual Engine

Ladder, Rear Entry Wide 4 Step

Powder Coated Walls

Privacy Station Assembly in Chaise

Seat Hinges, Hands Free Loading

Ski Tow Bar

Woven Vinyl Flooring

BIMINIS & ENCLOSURES

Bimini Top & Boot, Manual

Powder Coated Aluminium w/LED Lights

Mooring Cover, Color Matched

CONSTRUCTION & QUALITY

Corner Castings, Stainless Steel

Crossmembers, Extruded Aluminum

Deck, Limited Lifetime Warranty

Fasteners, Stainless Steel

Furniture, Hybrid Rotomold

V-Toon Hull

Lift Gates

Mooring Cleats, Stainless Steel (4)

Mooring Eyes

Motor Mount, Integrated Billet Aluminum

NMMA Certified using ABYC Standards

Nose Cones, Anti-spray integrated splash fins

Pontoon Tube Riser, Full-length

Powder Coated Rub Rail w/Stainless Steel Dock Guard

Riser Brackets, "M" Style

Transducer Bracket

Transom Plate, Billet Aluminum (DE only)

Wall Spacers, Deck Draining

Wall Tubing, Heavy Duty, .090" Thick, 1.25" Square

Wall Tubing, Powder Coated

LIGHTING

Bimini Anchor Light, LED

In Wall Docking & Navigation Lights, LED

Interior Courtesy Lights, LED

Bimini Top Lights, Blue LED

Cupholder Lights, Blue LED

Track Interior Lights, Blue LED

SOUND SYSTEMS

JL Audio MM50 Bluetooth Stereo
